channel.title: Comments on: Reimagining Heroism: Three Ways to Rethink the Hero’s Journey
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Weekly Wrap-Up: Week of Feb. 19, 2018 | Luna Station Quarterly

item.description: […] On Monday, Imelda Corazon (@imelda_corazon) discussed rethinking the process of the hero’s journey when applied to reading and writing stories in her column “Musings on Heroism;” […]
